name: collapse_action_bar
description: Collapse the action bar to hide it.

name: search
description: Initiate a search in the app.
parameters: {'search_query': 'What would you like to search for?'}

name: change_view
description: Change the current view of the calendar.

name: navigate_month
description: Navigate to a different month in the calendar.
parameters: {'direction': 'Which direction would you like to navigate? [left, right]'}

name: select_date
description: Select a specific date in the calendar.
parameters: {'date': 'Which date would you like to select?'}
